574:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ|
574:6: avinivartanīyena hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anantamaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ||
574:7: subhūtirāha-pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni nirdeṣṭum|
574:8: ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni|
574:9: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ|
574:11: ānimittasya apraṇihitasya anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti||
574:12: subhūtirāha-eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇām?
574:33: yatra subhūte na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam,
574:36: subhūtirāha-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena rūpataśca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sucitam|
574:38: yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena vijñānataśca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam|
574:39: bhagavānāha-imāni subhūte gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati-evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam|
574:42: tathā saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate|
574:44: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ|
574:45: tasya puruṣasya rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet|
574:46: sā khalu punaḥ strī paraparigṛhītā bhavet|
574:48: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?
574:49: subhūtirāha-strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran-iyamāgacchati, iyamāgatā|
574:54: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran ?
574:55: subhūtirāha- bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran|
574:56: bhagavānāha-yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran,
574:57: iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti,
574:58: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
574:61: evaṃ hi subhūte yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ,
574:64: yaśca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
574:65: ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamekadivasamapi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate||
574:66: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
574:73: yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta ekadivasamapi|
574:74: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati||
574:75: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
574:78: yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya dharmaṃ deśayet,
574:79: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati||
574:80: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
574:84: yaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt,
574:85: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati||
574:86: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
574:88: ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,
574:90: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
574:91: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati||
574:92: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
574:94: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
574:95: pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta|
574:96: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt,
574:98: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ prasavati,
574:99: yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā,
574:100: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati||
574:101: subhūtirāha-yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā,
574:103: bhagavānāha-so'pīdānīṃ subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate,
574:107: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate,
574:108: tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā|
574:109: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā,
574:111: subhūtirāha-aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,
574:114: asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi kṣapayitum||
574:131: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ityākhyātāḥ?
574:137: tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate|
574:138: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ-aprameyamiti vā,
574:151: subhūtirāha-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā,
574:164: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati|
574:169: prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati|
574:170: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,
574:171: kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
574:173: na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
574:175: na khalu punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate|
574:176: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate,
574:178: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti|
574:179: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati|
574:181: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ śīlapāramitā vivardhate,
574:183: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta śīlapāramiteti|
574:184: sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati|
574:186: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate,
574:188: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta kṣāntipāramiteti|
574:189: sa kṣāntyā saṃpādayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati|
574:191: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ vīryapāramitā vivardhate,
574:193: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta vīryapāramiteti|
574:194: sa vīryamārabhamāṇastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati|
574:196: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā vivardhate,
574:198: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dhyānapāramiteti|
574:199: sa dhyānāni samāpadyamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati|
574:201: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vivardhate,
574:203: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati-nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti|
574:204: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati|
574:206: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kā punareṣā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
574:214: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati|
574:216: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati|
574:217: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhirevaṃrūpairmanasikārairviharan āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti||
